column4: hi guys, instead of switching to a full unstable ubuntu, is it possible to install unstable apps of my choice?
it's possible, though some of the unstable apps may depend on unstable libraries which, in turn, will break otherwise stable apps
jrib's comment about backports is probably worth investigating first...
if that doesn't work out then you'll likely want to update your /etc/apt/sources.list and point it to unstable
